phone module¶

Phone ~~~ This file contains code for traversing the directories recursively and printing the indian phone number from CSV files.

phone.main(rootPath, fileExtension, numberRegex)[source]¶

This is the main function

Parameters:
  • rootPath – The root path where we should start the search from.
  • fileExtension – File extension which should be searched.
  • numberRegex – Regex of the number which should be searched
Return indianNumberList:
 

List of Indian phone numbers
Return type:

list.
